backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor defining all backend types (Language, Message, VideoRequest, CoinPurchasePlan, TransactionRecord, etc.) and importing modules for Stripe, HTTP outcalls, and access control for a multi-feature AI content platform.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping three link-sharing features (copy link, social share buttons, placement in layout) to their implementing files and associated test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Auto-generated JSON document summarizing each frontend source file's purpose, covering pages, hooks, components, and utilities across the React application.
frontend/.env: Local environment file defining placeholder Stripe publishable key and an empty Groq API key for development use.
frontend/.env.example: Example environment file documenting required Stripe and Groq API key variables with instructions on where to obtain them.
frontend/index.css: Root CSS file defining Tailwind base/components/utilities and a full set of OKLCH-based CSS custom properties for light and dark themes including sidebar and chart colors.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the Wrapper AI app, setting the page title, meta description, and mounting the React app via the root div and main.tsx module script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that memoizes a QueryClient, wraps the app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider, and renders AppContent alongside a Toaster notification component.
frontend/src/components/AppContent.tsx: Authentication gate component that shows a loading spinner during initialization, an error alert on auth failure, the LoginScreen when unauthenticated, or AuthenticatedLayout when a valid identity exists.
frontend/src/components/AuthenticatedLay: Main app shell with a sticky header (logo, coin balance, LinkShare, admin link), a mobile menu, sidebar navigation, and a renderContent switch that maps hash routes to page components.
frontend/src/components/CoinGate.tsx: Wrapper component that checks the user's coin balance and conditionally renders either an insufficient-coins alert with a Buy Coins button or the wrapped children content.
frontend/src/components/CoinPurchaseDial: A dialog component that displays available coin purchase plans, allows users to select a plan, and initiates a Stripe checkout session redirect on purchase.
frontend/src/components/LinkShare.tsx: A popover-based share component that lets users copy the current page URL or share it via WhatsApp, Facebook, or Twitter/X.
frontend/src/components/TransactionHisto: A card component that fetches and displays the user's recent coin transaction history, showing credits and debits with timestamps and running balance.
frontend/src/constants/coins.ts: Defines coin cost constants for actions and image generation, a low-balance threshold, and user-facing insufficient/low-balance messages.
frontend/src/constants/languages.ts: Exports a typed array of 60+ language options (value/label pairs) for use in script, voice, and subtitle language selectors.
frontend/src/hooks/coinQueryKeys.ts: Centralizes React Query cache keys for coin-related queries: balance, plans, and transaction history.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches an ICP backend actor using React Query, returning either an authenticated or anonymous actor based on the current Internet Identity, and invalidates dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminAddCoins.ts: Provides a React Query mutation hook that calls the backend `adminAddCoins` method to add coins to a target principal.
frontend/src/hooks/useAIImageGenerator.t: A hook that manages AI image generation by checking coin balance, charging coins via the backend actor, and calling an external image generation API, with configurable endpoint and API key placeholders.
frontend/src/hooks/useAIVideoMaker.ts: A hook that provides script and storyboard generation functions for AI video creation by calling the backend actor with structured VideoRequest payloads built from form data.
frontend/src/hooks/useChat.ts: Manages chat state and message sending logic, supporting both backend actor calls and Groq API multi-turn conversations with optional image attachments and coin error handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useCoinBalance.ts: Fetches the current user's coin balance from the backend actor using React Query, waiting until the actor is ready.
Fetches the list of available coin purchase plans from the backend actor using React Query.
frontend/src/hooks/useColdEmailGenerator: Provides state and a function to generate cold emails via the backend actor, handling coin errors and invalidating coin-related queries on success.
frontend/src/hooks/useCreateStripeChecko: Provides a mutation hook that creates a Stripe checkout session via the backend actor for a given coin purchase plan, constructing success/cancel URLs and converting prices to the smallest currency unit.
frontend/src/hooks/useHashRoute.ts: Implements hash-based client-side routing by reading and updating `window.location.hash`, mapping it to a set of valid view names.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an Internet Identity authentication context and provider, managing AuthClient creation, login, logout, and persisting identity across page reloads.
frontend/src/hooks/useIsAdmin.ts: Queries the backend to determine whether the current caller has admin privileges.
frontend/src/hooks/useProfile.ts: Provides hooks to fetch and save the current user's profile via the backend actor, with cache invalidation on save.
frontend/src/hooks/usePurchaseCoins.ts: Provides a mutation hook to purchase coins by plan ID via the backend actor, invalidating coin balance and transaction queries on success.
frontend/src/hooks/usePurchaseCoinsWithS: Provides a mutation hook to complete a Stripe-based coin purchase by passing a session ID and plan ID to the backend actor, then invalidating coin queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useSeoPackGenerator.t: Provides state and a function to generate an SEO pack (title, description, tags) for a video via the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useSubtitlesGenerator: Provides state and a function to generate subtitles from a script via the backend actor, returning both plain and SRT-formatted output.
frontend/src/hooks/useTransactionHistory: Fetches the current user's coin transaction history from the backend actor using React Query.
frontend/src/hooks/useVoiceoverGenerator: Custom React hook that calls the backend actor's `generateVoiceover` method with voice/language/emotion parameters, managing loading and error state.
frontend/src/hooks/useYouTubeScript.ts: Custom React hook that builds a structured YouTube script prompt and calls `generateVideoResponse` on the backend actor, handling coin-balance errors and cache invalidation.
frontend/src/index.css: Global stylesheet that imports Inter and Space Grotesk fonts, sets up Tailwind directives, and defines light/dark CSS custom properties for the design-token color system.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that mounts the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider wrapping the root App component.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPanelScreen.tsx: Admin-only panel that allows administrators to add coins to any user account by entering a principal ID and coin amount, with validation and toast notifications.
frontend/src/pages/ai-video-maker/buildP: Utility function that generates a formatted text-based video timeline plan from form data and photo order, serving as a placeholder since real MP4 rendering is unsupported.
frontend/src/pages/ai-video-maker/musicL: Defines the MusicTrack interface, a list of music categories, and a generator function that produces up to 1500 placeholder music tracks spread across those categories.
frontend/src/pages/ai-video-maker/MusicL: React component displaying a searchable, filterable list of music tracks from the music library, allowing the user to select a track for their video.
frontend/src/pages/ai-video-maker/PhotoT: React component for uploading images and reordering them via up/down controls to build a photo sequence for a video timeline.
frontend/src/pages/AIChatScreen.tsx: Chat UI page that lets users converse with an AI via a Groq API key stored in localStorage, supporting file attachments, coin-balance display, and a coin-purchase dialog.
frontend/src/pages/AIImageGeneratorScree: Page component for AI image generation that shows coin balance, accepts a text prompt, calls `useAIImageGenerator`, and provides download functionality for the generated image.
frontend/src/pages/AIVideoMakerScreen.ts: Page component for AI video creation that manages form state for script, storyboard, animation plan, and photo timeline generation, delegating work to the `useAIVideoMaker` hook.
frontend/src/pages/ColdEmailScreen.tsx: Form-based screen for generating cold emails using an AI backend, with fields for sender/target info, tone/goal/length options, and toggles for follow-ups and spam analysis.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardScreen.tsx: Main dashboard displaying the user's authentication status, principal ID, coin balance, and navigation cards to various AI features.
frontend/src/pages/LoginScreen.tsx: Login page that authenticates users via Internet Identity, handles popup blocker detection, and redirects to the dashboard on success.
Displays a payment cancelled/failed message with options to retry the purchase or return to the dashboard.
Handles post-Stripe-checkout processing by parsing session and plan IDs from the URL hash, crediting coins to the user's account, and showing success or error states.
frontend/src/pages/ProfileScreen.tsx: React page for viewing and editing a user's profile (display name, avatar) stored on-chain via Internet Identity, with logout and principal copy functionality.
frontend/src/pages/ProjectDefinitionScre: React page with a form wizard for defining project requirements (goal, target users, features, constraints) and displaying a summary after submission.
frontend/src/pages/youtube-script/Script: React tab component for configuring and generating YouTube video scripts, with form fields for topic, language, tone, and audience, plus coin-purchase handling and clipboard copy support.
frontend/src/pages/youtube-script/SeoPac: React tab component that generates a full YouTube SEO pack (titles, description, tags, hashtags, pinned comment, chapters) from a video title and topic, with copy-all functionality.
frontend/src/pages/youtube-script/Subtit: React tab component for generating subtitles (normal and SRT format) from a script, voiceover, or pasted text, with language/style selection, clipboard copy, and SRT file download.
frontend/src/pages/youtube-script/Voiceo: React tab component for generating voiceover scripts from an existing script tab output or pasted text, with options for voice gender, language, speed, and emotion.
frontend/src/pages/YouTubeScriptScreen.t: React page that organizes YouTube content creation into four tabs: Script, Voiceover, Subtitles, and SEO Pack, passing generated content between tabs.
frontend/src/utils/aiVideoMakerSummary.t: Utility function that serializes an AIVideoMakerFormData object into a human-readable summary string for display or logging.
frontend/src/utils/coinErrors.ts: Utility functions to detect insufficient-coins errors and return appropriate user-facing error messages.
frontend/src/utils/downloadImageFile.ts: Utility function that triggers a browser download of an image from a URL by programmatically clicking a temporary anchor element.
frontend/src/utils/downloadTextFile.ts: Utility function that creates a Blob from a text string and triggers a browser download with the specified filename.
frontend/src/utils/imageAttachment.ts: Collection of utility functions for handling image file attachments in chat, including file-to-Uint8Array conversion, Blob URL creation/revocation, and validation of image type, size, and dimensions.
frontend/src/utils/parseYouTubeScript.ts: Utility function that parses a raw markdown-style YouTube script string into ordered ScriptSection objects (Hook, Introduction, Main Points, etc.) based on ### headings.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routing, with helpers to persist, retrieve, and clear those parameters via sessionStorage and history.replaceState.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining dark mode, custom fonts (Inter, Space Grotesk), OKLCH-based design tokens for colors/borders/shadows, accordion keyframes, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project state manifest for 'Wrapper AI' tracking existing features (Copy Link button, social share buttons for WhatsApp/Facebook/Twitter, prominent placement) and a pending action request to add the full link-sharing feature.
